title:lich.descriptionText: Liches are mages that specialize in the darker arts of magic. They have a tendency to live in isolation and unfortunately often get a bad rap.
title:lich.restrictionText: Must take more Black classes than any other color.

title:sorcerer.descriptionText: Sorcerers are mages who can cast a spell for almost any situation. Sorcerers who do battle are commonly refered to as Elementalists.
title:sorcerer.restrictionText: Must take more Blue and Red classes than all other colors combined.

title:wizard.descriptionText: 'Wizard' is the general term for a mage that has studied to hone their skills and capabilities. The majority of magic users classify as wizards.
title:wizard.restrictionText: Except for Grey, may take no more than 15 credits from any color.

title:witch.descriptionText: Witches mix multiple branches of magic together. They never fight directly, instead using guile and nefarious methods to win their battles.
title:witch.restrictionText: Must take at least two of the following: Familiar, Curses, Toxic, Conjuration

title:druid.descriptionText: Druids are defenders of the forest, both the plants and creatures that dwell there. They only harm those who harm nature.
title:druid.restrictionText: No Black or Red classes (save for Earth Magic). Must have at 15 credits from Green classes

title:alchemist.descriptionText: Alchemists create and enhance the effects of objects. The best of the best are even able to transmute objects, which leads to easy wealth.
title:alchemist.restrictionText: Must take at least two of the following: Jewelcraft, Enchanting, Conjuration

title:priest.descriptionText: Priests give blessings and heal the sick. They do not fight humans or monsters in the wild, but do combat and ward against demons.
title:priest.restrictionText: No Black classes. At most one Red class. Must have 15 credits from White classes.

title:defender.descriptionText: Defenders tend to fight in armies ensuring the other troops are not defeated by enemy mages. They mostly avoid direct combat.
title:defender.restrictionText: Must take at least two of the following: Despel, Reflect, Shielding, Healing

title:battlemage.descriptionText: Battlemages fight the monsters of the world, earning great fame from their deeds. Many go down as legends, imortalized in history books..
title:battlemage.restrictionText: Must take at least one of the following: Mana channeling, Martial Arts. Must have at least 15 credits from Red classes.

title:spellblade.descriptionText: Spellblades enchant their weapons to be as effective as possible against whatever they are fighting. They have vast knowledge of monsters.
title:spellblade.restrictionText: Must take Enchanting. Must have at least 3 Red classes.
